plot: Robbers murder a wealthy landowner and steal his safe, transporting it in their boat. They are caught and the ringleader is killed.
title: The River Pirates
plot_es: Robbers murder a wealthy landowner and steal his safe, transporting it in their boat. They are caught and the ringleader is killed.
plot_en: Robbers murder a wealthy landowner and steal his safe, transporting it in their boat. They are caught and the ringleader is killed.
